ygData.subject: Re: Anyone know what language a lot of those books that have spell recipies are in? Is it High Erudian? Anyone know o f any monsters that give words and so forth??
ygData.msgSnippet: Fortunately as a Necromancer I believe we already get average skill in Dark Speech, but that may just be the Dark Elves.  There s nothing like being a Dark Elf
ygData.messageBody:
Fortunately as a Necromancer I believe we already get average skill
in Dark Speech, but that may just be the Dark Elves. There's nothing like
being a Dark Elf Necromancer and getting Teir'Dall, Elder Teir'Dal, and
Dark Speech for FREE.

Malark Zaren'Tul, Karana

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Simon [mailto:simon21@...]
> Sent: Thursday, April 29, 1999 12:01 PM
> To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
> Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Re: Anyone know what language a lot of those
> books that have spell recipies are in? Is it High Erudian? Anyone know
> of any monsters that give words and so forth??
>
>
> From: "Simon" <simon21@...>
>
> More than likely the spells for necromancers will be in Dark
> Speech or some
> other exotic language. But don't quote me on that because i'm
> not for sure,
> I'm just thinking that is hte most logical language for a Necro
>
